dev-1.x.name: drupal/flexible

security-coverage.message: Project has not opted into security advisory coverage!

dev-1.x.description: For flexible of theme development. As a initial starting point for Drupal theme development. Theme features RESPONSIVE design with Bootstrap and light weight design. Theme is develop by Shivcharan Patil(Shiv). Theme developer is also available at itApplication.net or email at shiv@itweb.in to customize this theme or create/develop entirely new theme as per your requirements. Theme developer Shivcharan Patil(Shiv) is available for theme customizetion or new theme development. Contact theme developer at itApplication.net or Send Mail.
